game.name: Fate Dealer
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Bet your freedom in a deadly quiz where a single answer can save you… or kill you. Will you take the Dealer’s offer or walk away alive?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Bet your freedom in a deadly quiz where a single answer can save you… or kill you. Will you take the Dealer’s offer or walk away alive?
